name: panelzero
description: Role-based multi-agent AI grading system for academic thesis defenses
author: PanelZero Team

scripts.dev: concurrently -n "FRONTEND,BACKEND,WORKER" -c "cyan,magenta,yellow" "pnpm run frontend:dev" "pnpm run backend:dev" "pnpm run backend:worker"
scripts.dev:unix: concurrently -n "FRONTEND,BACKEND,WORKER" -c "cyan,magenta,yellow" "pnpm run frontend:dev" "pnpm run backend:dev:unix" "pnpm run backend:worker:unix"
scripts.backend:install: cd backend && python -m venv venv && venv\Scripts\python.exe -m pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.backend:install:unix: cd backend && python3 -m venv venv && venv/bin/python -m pip install -r requirements.txt
